title: Degradation and detection of tetracycline by a bifunctional Bi4Ti3O12/Ag heterojunction under light and piezoelectric effect
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3499-3509
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00260A, Paper
Junzhuyan Wang, Chenjie Zhang, Zhao Qi, Minmin Xu, Yaxian Yuan, Jianlin Yao
Herein, we combined Bi4Ti3O12 nanosheets with silver nanoparticles to obtain BiTO/Ag heterojunctions for efficient degradation by piezo-photocatalysis and detection by surface enhanced Raman spectroscopy.
